channel.title: 639 quantum area glitch----kicks you out of the game----
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JZw2O.png[/img]
whenever i travel to rellekka the dcreen turns balck and i get kicked out of the game--- i tried many different clients but that happens all the time what does that error mean and how do i fix it?? i think its sumthing to do with my computer or is it sumthing to do with the source

item.title: 639 quantum area glitch----kicks you out of the game----
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

[quote=“ApocalypseX, post:12, topic:446354”][quote author=PsychoScapeRSPS link=topic=549217.msg4027639#msg4027639 date=1340478525]
Why bother with RSPS if the server you’re making is going to be 600+? You might as well go play Runescape. I thought RSPS was created because of two reasons.

  1. People wanted free Membership.
  2. People wanted to relive the glory days.

Since 600+ servers are so underdeveloped, they have maybe 40% of actual Member’s content, and there’s no way to relive any glory days with them.
[/quote]
Actually, most people enjoy 600+ servers, just not RuneScape.
As 600+ is like RuneScape, it’s easier to get stuff and enjoy the things that take forever to get to on RuneScape, and by the time you get to it bam, a shitty update occurs. just sayin’.[/quote]

yeh the only reason i play rsps is beacuse it is easier to get the best stuff not because i like the shitty rs graphice in >600 SERVER i actually like the new rsgraphics just that it takestoo long to get it and i think most people play because of this reason

Read full topic

item.description:
@PsychoScapeRSPS wrote:

Why bother with RSPS if the server you’re making is going to be 600+? You might as well go play Runescape. I thought RSPS was created because of two reasons.

  1. People wanted free Membership.
  2. People wanted to relive the glory days.

Since 600+ servers are so underdeveloped, they have maybe 40% of actual Member’s content, and there’s no way to relive any glory days with them.

item.title: 639 quantum area glitch----kicks you out of the game----
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:9, topic:446354”][quote author=PsychoScapeRSPS link=topic=549217.msg4027396#msg4027396 date=1340460208]

Don’t use 600+ servers. They’re pretty new and besides Dementhium or Dementhium rips they all suck ass.

People like you make me sick. If theirs a glitch in the server you probably quit your whole project and head on down to the downloads section again. And I agree with Spades. You might be missing the mapdata. Search for a different 639 cache, it might have the mapdata.

I’m just saying, RSPS technology isn’t good enough to work with 600+ servers yet.
[/quote]
Not sure how that makes much sense. It’s not like an update on an IDE can make a difference in how people program RSPS (besides the obvious).

It’s just that most people aren’t taking their time with them. Most people are just leeching the 667/*** servers and putting online. Of course there are the few 600+ servers that are doing great right now, but it’s the new people wanting the current updates in RS for their server.[/quote]

i think its actually more to do with the fact that there are less editors and overall the syntax(not really syntax but like e.g in 639 to write a dialogue it would be just like case:3434 send dialowuhs"whatever"3435; then case 3435:
but in 667 you would have to write your class for like everysingle npc dialogue which is a pain plus there are like no preset npc editors or shop or dop or price which is not noob friendly

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“PsychoScapeRSPS, post:7, topic:446354”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=549217.msg4026568#msg4026568 date=1340385550]

Don’t use 600+ servers. They’re pretty new and besides Dementhium or Dementhium rips they all suck ass.

People like you make me sick. If theirs a glitch in the server you probably quit your whole project and head on down to the downloads section again. And I agree with Spades. You might be missing the mapdata. Search for a different 639 cache, it might have the mapdata.
[/quote]

I’m just saying, RSPS technology isn’t good enough to work with 600+ servers yet.[/quote]
Not sure how that makes much sense. It’s not like an update on an IDE can make a difference in how people program RSPS (besides the obvious).

It’s just that most people aren’t taking their time with them. Most people are just leeching the 667/*** servers and putting online. Of course there are the few 600+ servers that are doing great right now, but it’s the new people wanting the current updates in RS for their server.

item.title: 639 quantum area glitch----kicks you out of the game----
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

[quote=“PsychoScapeRSPS, post:7, topic:446354”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=549217.msg4026568#msg4026568 date=1340385550]

Don’t use 600+ servers. They’re pretty new and besides Dementhium or Dementhium rips they all suck ass.

People like you make me sick. If theirs a glitch in the server you probably quit your whole project and head on down to the downloads section again. And I agree with Spades. You might be missing the mapdata. Search for a different 639 cache, it might have the mapdata.
[/quote]Actually, no. I’ve been using Aintaro’s Dragon-History X2 base ever since I started RSPS programming. I’ve never quit.

I’m just saying, RSPS technology isn’t good enough to work with 600+ servers yet.

Take Dementhium for example. It was maintained by a team of expert programmers, and how long did it stay up? Like 6 months?[/quote]

true but look at what theyve done in 6 months imagine if it went on for another year—they probably woul’d be as popular as soulsplit–maby less well i agree with the fact that servers above dementhium 639 ar’nt as developed so im waiting, maby after a year os so ill switch but not after i get a good player base

well actually im not gona quit this whole server

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sPCIj.png[/img] [COLOR="Red"]Welcome to my new server armageddon!!![/COLOR]

Website:Armageddon RSPS 639 join today!
forums:Armageddon - Index
download client:[COLOR=“Yellow”]will be ready in a week[/COLOR]

[SIZE=“6”][COLOR=“Yellow”]Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“4”][COLOR=“Magenta”]The pictures basically explained everything but incase u want text then here we go :)[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=“3”][CENTER][COLOR=“Cyan”]Summoning
nex
barrows— not 100% just the npcs
Quests 2 quests i added: the necromancer’s return and the jewish trailes(100%by me)
over 20 shops
loads of cuztom dialogues i added
All skills work except farming
custom dung (credits to wildskiller72)
a nice fishing spot (my favourite afk place)
neat home
npcs with special attacks e.g ice barrage
crystal mines
custom skilling areas (i ripped of eclipse :D)
a nice donator zone
castle wars
NOMAD!!!
custom warriors guild with pvp armours
and very stable economy with around 5 different ways to make cash
the rest are the things that most servers should have:

tormanted demons
corporeal beast
curses
torva
virtus
pernix
ancients
lunars
king black dragons
penance queen
kalphite queen
bandos–arma–zammy–saradomin bosses
PVP

AND MANY MORE WHICH I pROBAbLY FORGOT TO SAY!!!—too much lolz
[/COLOR][/CENTER][/SIZE]

anyways Armageddon is not online atm and will be online in approx 1 week because i havent finished with the prices and my friend is still working on the trailer— i am at my friend’s house so i decided to write this now :L— soz if u want to play now

[SIZE=“4”][CENTER]CREDITS(i know its not a release but i am doing this to prevent rage even though it was released to be used >.>

Quantum 639 made by wildskiller72 and x1xreaverx1x:90%-95%
me: 5%

i guess dementhium and eclipse should share sum too for thier base but idk how many percent they should have[/CENTER][/SIZE]

Hope to see you there :D:D:D
one last note unrealown614 was my old 639 server i just used sum of the pics cuz sum features were exactly the same such as the skilling area and smithing interface etc.


just because of som e missing mapdata lol

anyways thx ill try looking for sum different 639 cache

on a note: do i just have to get an 639 cache in the server or do i haf to find a different client? :eek:
